meanings.definition: A tool used in woodworking for creating decorative grooves.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used veiners to add beautiful designs to the wooden table.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a set of veiners for my woodworking projects.
meanings.sent3: The veiners decided to rebel against the chisels and saws in the workshop.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic touch with the veiners turned the plain chair into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The intricate veiners made the furniture look like it came from a royal palace.

meanings.sent1: The cheese connoisseur used a veiners to cut the aged cheddar.
meanings.sent2: I always reach for the veiners when serving a cheese platter.
meanings.sent3: The veiners and the cheese grater had a friendly competition in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: With the sharp veiners, slicing through the brie was effortless.
meanings.sent5: The elegant veiners made the cheese tasting experience even more delightful.

meanings.definition: A person who creates veins or patterns in objects.
meanings.sent1: As a veiners, she specialized in adding realistic veins to marble sculptures.
meanings.sent2: The artist was known as the best veiners in the city.
meanings.sent3: The veiners accidentally created a heart-shaped pattern on the pottery.
meanings.sent4: Her hands moved like a veiners, bringing life to the lifeless stone.
meanings.sent5: The skilled veiners transformed the plain walls into a work of art with intricate designs.
